name: Bhavya
greetingText: I wanted to take a moment to extend my best wishes to you.
wishText: Wishing you continued success and happiness in the year ahead, #Busy Person.
textInChatBox: Happy Birthday, Bhavya! Wishing you health, happiness, and fulfillment in all that you do.
text2: I hope this message brings a smile.
text3: Whether it's on the day or close to it,
text4: I truly wanted to share this with you because
text5Content: You deserve all the joy, love, and blessings today and always. Have a beautiful birthday!
outroText: Please let me know if this brought a smile to your face.
replayText: Or click here if you'd like to see it again.
